about_the_game:
Jellycod recaptures the core of classic shooters. Return to the simple days of playing first person shooters with your friends. Grab your bolt action rifle in 'rifles only' mode or compete in 5v5 Search and Destroy.

Classic Search & Destroy Game-Mode
A 5v5 Attack/Defend scenario in which the first team to win 8 rounds goes home victorious. Perfect your tactics, sprint timings, and when to aim down sights in this highly competitive game mode. Every life matters and every round counts.

More Coming!

name: JellyCod

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10 (x64) - Windows 11 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2310
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTS 450 or equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Jellycod recaptures the core of classic shooters. Return to the simple days of playing first person shooters with your friends. Grab your bolt action rifle in 'rifles only' mode or compete in 5v5 Search and Destroy. Wishlist now!
